Percptor:

"Worry?"said a voice behind Maxima's back

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, MaximaSR74@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 5/21/04 12:21:32 AM Central Daylight Time, 
> airly2002@h... writes:
> 
> 
> > Hydras smelled Maximascent and he smiled devilish, she alwas 
would 
> > be his loyalest bot... 
> > 
> > 
> 
> Those crimson optics glanced at Hydras with a held back grin. 
> 
> Then glanced up.. not really at the ceiling.. but.. as though 
elsewhere. 
> Within.. something didn't feel right. Something.. odd.
